articles.author: Adela Suliman
articles.title: What to know about Lunar New Year: The Year of the Dragon - The Washington Post
articles.description: As a billion people in much of Asia and across the world celebrate Lunar New Year this weekend, here’s what to know about the auspicious Year of the Dragon.
articles.content: Over 1 billion people around the globe are celebrating the Lunar New Year, often referred to as Chinese New Year, this weekend. Out with the quick-witted rabbit and in with the auspicious, fiery drag… [+351 chars]
